Uses of Package
org.opengis.metadata.constraint

Packages that use org.opengis.metadata.constraint
Package
Description
org.apache.sis.metadata.iso
Root package for ISO 19115 metadata about resources (data or services).
org.apache.sis.metadata.iso.constraint
Information about legal and security constraints placed on data.
org.apache.sis.metadata.iso.identification
Information to uniquely identify the data or service.
org.opengis.metadata
Root package for metadata.
org.opengis.metadata.constraint
Constraints information (includes legal and security).
org.opengis.metadata.identification
Identification information (includes data and service identification).
  • Classes in org.opengis.metadata.constraint used by org.apache.sis.metadata.iso
    Class
    Description
    Constraints
    Restrictions on the access and use of a resource or metadata.
  • Classes in org.opengis.metadata.constraint used by org.apache.sis.metadata.iso.constraint
    Class
    Description
    Classification
    Name of the handling restrictions on the dataset.
    Constraints
    Restrictions on the access and use of a resource or metadata.
    LegalConstraints
    Restrictions and legal prerequisites for accessing and using the resource.
    Restriction
    Limitation(s) placed upon the access or use of the data.
    SecurityConstraints
    Handling restrictions imposed on the resource for national security or similar security concerns.
